Title: Silverlight Front end calling WCF Service in Azure Web Role
Description: I  recently written a sample which has Windows Azure Web Role with Silverlight front end, calling to WCF service which is hosted in the same Windows Azure Web Role.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
I recently written a sample which has Windows Azure Web Role with Silverlight front end, calling to WCF service which is hosted in the same Windows Azure Web Role.


Please visit my blog to get sample walk through:
http://blogs.msdn.com/b/avkashchauhan/archive/2011/11/29/silverlight-front-end-calling-to-wcf-service-all-in-one-windows-azure-web-role-sample.aspx
